twitch_info.title: Highlight: I wanna kill the kamilia 3 - Extra Stage - Screen 9 - EX Hades [#3]

message.body: letting go of shift in time is so bruh lmao
wow, you already made it this far on this screen? cool
you are past the save that was hardest for me
I got consistent at the urethra jump today
and then cleared it easily enough
the thing with me and precise stuff is the hard part is learning how to do it but
after a while I can just doit
probably why I keep making new strats for ttt2 lunatic
also thanks to Redire for telling me how to do the urethra jump cause
it used some crazy numpad shenanigans
yea I wouldnt know that strat myself
I already forgot most of the setups here
Hold right and shift -> bonk -> hold num0 and num1(!) -> touch platform -> release shift.
That's the strat for urethra jump
also turns out you can actually release shift earlier than touching the platform and it will auto move you upwards
platform physics with numpad be like that lmao
Redire also mentioned this about numpad:
Actually, num4 and num6 let you move left and right when you hold num0 some numpad combinations give you ungodly powers like being able to move left and right without holding a single button
what? these things are too bigbrain for me xD
Nick24 â€” Today at 10:34 If you press shift and numlock number at the same time while falling you cancel
press jump --> press num0 --> press num4/6
not need to press right or left thing LUL
cause you get a lowered jump height than normal
as well as being able to cancel out
if you can do it right that does worok
these numpad strats are extremely weird
there's also a numpad strat that has you go perfectly jumping right on the same frame
back in my day, when I pressed a button I knew why I was doing it LUL
o ye forgot we talked about t hat jump same fram thing already LUL
I got that from Redire too
Redire really knows numpad well huh
just 8 more hours until my main save file is 600 hours
my first playthrough was about 400, no extra or crystals yet
so maybe it's not so bad then
since mine's been 100% as I go
Including getting both crystals in ex screen 1 before going through the warp
my current run with 2/7 ex bosses and all crystals is around 190 or something
yea I got both crystals at once too
yeah first playthrough is a lot slower for sure
I mean just look at my NAMTG
which reminds me I spent like many hours on tt2 lunatic first time
its expected for it to go that way, with most games
did your 190 hour time including secret 5? xd
secret 5 only took me like an hour 2nd time
its not an issue for me
gravity man on the other hand LUL
ex Rz was 5-6 hours for me iirc
but that was 2nd playthrough secret 5 and 1st RZ
I think Max's Secret 5 was 29 hours
you don't really realise how bad secret 5 is in the first 20 hours
so Im' glad you beat it quickly
yea I bet that is the case
I certainly would have gotten mad
It was when I reached 40-50 hours I started getting upset
but it didn't truly hit home until 60 hours
especially if you die a lot near the end
and by the time I cleared it at 79 hours I cried LUL
Yeah I had 8 deaths to screen 9
i could've cleared it int he 30-40 hour mark
I died to screen 9 too, but dont remember how many times
I do find it funny that my 9th attempt to screen 9 was the clear.
I still think that's amazing XD
even having the right align doesn't make this save easy LUL
right pixel spot, right align but still tough
need to get that 5 frame after jumping off the tas ledge iirc
plus have to be on the right pixel
or else jumping off thet as ledge is instant death
5 frame is not exactly a nasty required jumpheight though
oh no it's not quite save 2
@Eradem no its not that, 4 frame is just too low
save 2 was the hardest for me
I have a strat for save 2
Did you know if you hold shift for the second squish, you fall through easily?
then you can let go and tap it normally and continue as normal
Yeah, for some reason holding shift messes with the vspeed or something like that I believe
anyway it makes that second squish very doable
yeah full jump for first and keep holding the key until you get through the next diagonal
holding shift does nothing for your vspeed btw
well it does something for the jump
not sure what but it made a huge difference
Could've just been the full jump that did it, and had nothing to do with holding it down?
after the kid reaches 23 frame and starts falling shift does nothing whatsover
right so basically if you reach 23 frame then that second diagonal is much easier
well you can use it to set up a cancel, but thats a different thing
I think the reaason I held shift was I wasn't timing it right by letting go of shift too early.
So I found it easier to just hold
I believe that's whyI held shift for the duration until past second diagonal
its the 3rd diagonal and the 16 pixels that are hard tho imo
but yeah that strat made it much easier
then I just do the double jump before 3rd diagonal
I actually first tried the ceiling diamond invert
well yea you kinda need a 1 frame
But I first tried it so I'm happy
you know the align on the left of the ceiling diamond invert?
if you grab that align, jump through the small gap
you get a really good arc for landing
rather than accidentally hit the bottom left spike
I think I get what you mean
Made it much easier for me to land in the gap below after taking the align
Never failed it since I got that strat
Before that strat I'd fail it like 90% of the time
not the pixel, I mean grabbing the align without dying
well if it works now ok
yea grabbing the align is like nerfed gate into 16 pixel landing, without any strat
that's why I made that jump through 16 pixel strat
made it much easier every time
with that strat you would have 3 frames of space to land on, instead of 2
ty for the explanation cause I don't know the mechanics, just know what works
I just have that sense of what to do with some things
but can neer explain how it works
can tell you how I did it and that it made it easier
I have a lot of timemachine 2 tricks that I cannot explain that make jumps free and/or super easy.
it probably makes needle somewhat easier to know each jump height and stuff like that
like 5 frame is high through regular gate or high no bonk in 2 block space, 13 frame is highest not bonking in 3 block space
the save I'm most worried about is next save.
because I've never successfully managed the corner drop
you need a frame perfect single jump for the corner drop
forget what it is, like 15 frame or something
then hold into it and fulljump? I think
yeah you hold left for the going through
didn't know about the full jump after tho
well its just the doublejump through
is very bruh to get over those two diagonals and back onto the ledge again lmfao
When practicing it, it genuinely hurt my hands
also this save I know how to do every part of it
btw ty for letting me know it didn't matter what pixel I was on the ledge tho
oh, I didnt say that xD
not sure what align you have here
I've taken the align Redire took LUl
he does things optimal as hell
so he's pretty good guide for these things
I would guess you want to be on the very edge of the tas before jumping
cant really open jtool rn though
doesn't appear to need very edge of tas
I think you were 4 framing there
I didn't set itu p right LUL
idk what the setup for the ending is
yeah it's a fall stutter tap thing
walk off pause hold right and pray xD
simply put nothing else platforming wise is ex rz
like despite theinputs I'm quite relaxed on this screen
its not too horrible luckily, glad they didnt put some cancerous L needle
where the frame perfect single jump is
I think I'm gonna ope njtool rq
getting 15 is so much harder than 14 frames
if there was no vstring hold left there, then it would suck
land on tas, 2 frame off hold left
I can do it better in K3 than I canhere
actually 2 frame or 3 frame off both work
even without that strat the final jump is not too bad but a bit of extra consistency would help
if you are landing on the other side of tas anyway you may as well do that
or if you dont want to do that then dont land on the left side of the ledge
I have a setup that works /really/ well in K3
I think the reason I couldn't jtool it is I'm not used to the visuals
got like at least a 90% consistency with it in jtool
jtool I seem to have issues with LUL
At least I know how to do this now
you should at least try mine too, low jump off the tas and hold left into the drop
just need to double jump late
and press 2 buttons same frame for 1st jump
it's probably worth doing yours over risking landing onthe ledge a second time anyway
mine does land on the ledge a 2nd time
I did it in one bound
still can't believe I'm on pre-final save of hades already
this so much faster than I expected.
Still can't believe I'm so close to finishing extra tho
ye its not too much left
yeah just these two saves, and then emperor
will have 49 of 50 crystals really soon which is based LUL
I mean look at that final jump
the double invert is kinda bruh
then you have a really awkward double gate jump to ledge
eh you can just numpad it right?
and then there's the final jump itself which looks scary af
I assume it's you do a diamond, and then you cancel in the platform
and then you do a long jump
just jump in there and 2 frame 2 frame 2 frame
string of 2 frames sounds a lot easier ngl
but not super easy to get in 1st gate
and the timings are still frame perfect
I was trying with jumpcancels in jtool for a long while and it sucked
insane I've done two saves today tho
but then I found that 2 frames just work
soon you have to think about what order you wanna do the bosses in
I want that trrash out of the way
As for the last two bosses
that'll be EX Colonel, and then EX Emperor last
I'll finish off extra bosses before doing extra devas
what the, how is he on this save now
Once I start extra devas I'll be doing EX Piano, EX Dotkid, EX Colonel, EX Emperor, in that order.
As for extra bosses order, ideally I want to to do Tokoroten, then yoyo then blue
But I'm not sure if you can freely choose extra bosses
so ye already thought about this tho :D
been thinking about the order for months
you can choose the order, why could you not?
wasn't sure cause you walk off the screen to go to next one
so thought it'd loop you around if you didn't beat one
It's the only one I wasn't sure about. xD
main reason for doing tokoroten first is all the other bosses are better
Then everything else will be more fun
plus fuck the idea of going through all the fun stuff, to then do tokoroten
originally I intended to do tokoroten last but
Max said that EX Emperor is the real final boss of K3 and I was like, yeah it's the hardest one as well so
and then eventually I thought about it alittle more
Tokoroten does need to be defeated asap
and yeah beaten two saves today knoddy:D
I could defo beat this one too
I'm looking forward to escaping extra at this point
77 hours inEX RZ is enough for any person
once I reach that ledge there is a 50/50 chance I'll beat the save
I too believe it's possible I might first try it.
only issue is the inputs for it are super awkward
allen you meant 2f or 1f off the second lege didn't you
ye I know it's no cancel
both heights let you hold left and not die to the spike
besides cancel wouldn't make the distance
@Eradem what distance? you may be thinking of a different part
got my conssitency back for 2nd ledge
just gotta get there and pray I make the 50/50 two diagonal ceiling bs
I hope you are not doing some weird stuff xD
ye didn't have it showing on screen that time lmao
ex hades is a /lot/ easier than I thought it was gonna be
doesn't hold a candle to anything in ex rz
which I'm glad cause ex rz was hell LUL
you can also do a 21 frame, instead of the 15
why sometime sif I hold longer
I think this is the hardest save of this screen.
I wonder who made this screen LUL
was it like a pre-made screen that kamilia buffed or?
save 2 turned out to not be that hard at all
save 3 wasn't that hard either it turns out
its a screen in hades but idk who did the buffs
it has the signature kamilia corner trope
they still could have put the landing at the very end of this save 1 block further left
so be glad they didnt LUL
and they could've made that triple diamond a full fledged one
with the very specific frames bs
regular triple dia is easier than that one
if you mean leehe triple dia
thats not possible at that height iirc
I recall there being a jump that was cpu dependent at one point LUL
not for this gfame but LUL
2 and a half hours left of my day
acutally can make it with that mistake
ngl this cancel at the start of the save is not amusing
this save would be fine without it
thoughI am glad it's a cancel rather than an awkward jump
you are trying to land on the 2nd tas ledge without a doublejump? or was that unintentional?
I actually could've got the save while screwing it up that way
but I wasn't prepared to use my backup strat
I dont dislike the 2nd, but thats probably unpopular opinion LUL
the 1st is just why the fuck tho
at the start of save no
it would be if it was far in
gets me through most of the time so
so like I don't think it's a 1f
I'm pretty sure I'm 2fing it every time
if it was a true required 1f I would've had to have learnt a numpad cancel strat for it LUL
unless I genuinely am somehow 1fing with shift
for a 1frame mini F like that, 2  frames dont work
1 frame or some kind of cactus
is I'm doing a 1 frame shift input
no 2 frame ever without a/d trick
I didn't even know I was doing that
I didn't think my keyboard even could 1f with single shift
seems kinda unlikely, were you really???
in which caseI always cancelled that ye
Yeah I always cancelled the steak ye
I find it easier to cancel a steak while running
I don't think most people think the same LUL
it'd be nice if I stop shambling the frame perfect
I'm now following my traditional failure pattern again
I may be on this save for like 5-6 hours
so welcome to my new home
looking forward to emperor tho cause I'll be nearly done
looking forward to playing untested impossible bosses B)
well they've all been beaten so
i couldnt think of a more appropriate adjective for this case
admittedly only by 5 people tho XD
ex colonel is the boss I'm most looking forward to
ex emperor I dunno what I'm going to feel about
I usually like colonel bosses, so ex colonel is right up my alley
that 2nd corner is so hard for some reason
you have bad align for it
the 1st one after landing is not
the bad align is if I touch the walls before it
I think I already have the good align if I don't from here
so you still have that align from back there?
let me see if thats good
wait, show which align again with the cursor?
I may have looked at a different one
yeah it makes a huge difference
It must be all those attempts I was getting past 2nd corner easily
I didn't accidentally grab the wrong align on those attempts
well with that out of the way, back to grinding as normal again LUL
I always wondered why Redire didn't touch the align in that gap
I forgot that was a thing
this isd efo the hardest save on this screen
maybe if you died 10 times to the final jump of save 2
but the setup for save 2 isn't that bad
I'd give save 2 2nd hardest for sure
failed to use backup strat when it went south lul
it was half way there to doing the strat tho so
is a full jump 23f or smth?
it is very very hard to visually tell apart a 21 frame and a full jump
still phenomenal progress today, even if I don't beat this save LUL
as usual not doing k3 on monday
but come tuesday again back to le grind
that was inches away from what would probably be the clear attempt
This save is honestly so trash
you just keep doing it and praying
@Eradem lol I love this sentance, fits so many fangame things
like maybe you'll make it maybe you won't
this is basically rng except not rng
you can get better at getting a specific jump height
of course it can be hard if you dont even see what jumps you are getting
you can prac it in  jtool but ingame its more just pray
e x a c t l y
and then there's the double jump onto the ledge that
I have no ide ahow I do it
This save can ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ in hell tbh
it's roughly as hard as one of the rz segments
to make this as hard as rz
all you'd need to do is remove next save
Its probably safe to say I'd still be on the save to this day LUL
well, maybe its feasible, hard to tell
it would be a hell of a grind
it would certainly be RZ tho
I don't think I'm beating this save tonight
I got close but no cigar
guess there had to be a first
wasn't ex rz it happened on
reminds me of the time my s key stopped working fully and I could save after a really hard save
chances of me beating this save again tonight are like zero
at least I proved I can do it
really not happy about that lmfao
I thought I hit Z as well
turns out I did hit Z
you made the landing too xD
if you fall on the spike but shoot you can hit the save and save it
yeah I was expecting smth like that
if you are close that is
and had that happen I'd still have saved
still can't believe I made the landing
its a good meme at least

so you can't actually do what I just did
sounds like a good idea xD
that was so shitty it's unbelievable
hardest, worst save of EX Hades
m a l d i n g rn
pretty much guaranteed to be on this tomorrow caus eof that shit
at leasat it didn't force me to go back to save 1
other than that it'd be okay
I usually always make the landing to the save anyway
yea if you didnt try to save fast it would have probably been fine
It'sa miracle this hasn't happened before
another good one that I used to have, is I use autohotkey to make 's' left shift sometime, and when trying to save I just jump into a spike above
this is certified worst save I've played in like years
I'm sure if I was a better player
but at my skill level it's intolerable.

this is where I spend like
